name: ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval
description: The premier international forum for the presentation of new research results and for the demonstration of new systems and techniques in the broad field of information retrieval (IR). It is the top and most prestigious conference in the field.
location_info: Rotates globally (e.g., Washington D.C., Taipei, Madrid)

name: The ACM Web Conference
description: Formerly known as WWW, this is a top-tier annual conference on the topic of the World Wide Web. It covers a wide range of topics, including search, data mining, web science, and user behavior, attracting both academia and industry leaders.

name: ACM International Conference on Web Search and Data Mining
description: A highly-ranked academic conference that publishes original research on search, data mining, and related topics. It is known for its strong technical papers and is a key venue for the web search community.

name: ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management
description: A major conference that brings together leading researchers from the database, information retrieval, and knowledge management communities. It covers a broad range of topics including search, NLP, and data management.

name: European Conference on Information Retrieval
description: The primary European forum for the presentation of new research in the field of Information Retrieval. While European-focused, it has a strong international presence and reputation.
location_info: Primarily in Europe (e.g., Glasgow, Dublin, Stavanger)

name: ACM SIGIR International Conference on the Theory of Information Retrieval
description: A conference focused on the theoretical aspects of IR, including models, algorithms, and evaluation methodologies. It is a key venue for foundational research in the search domain.

name: ACM Conference on Recommender Systems
description: The premier international forum for the presentation of new research results, systems and techniques in the broad field of recommender systems. It's a sister field to search with significant overlap.

name: Haystack - The Search Relevance Conference
description: An industry-focused conference dedicated to improving search relevance. It brings together engineers and practitioners to share case studies, best practices, and new techniques for tuning search engines like Solr and Elasticsearch.
location_info: Primarily in the USA (e.g., Charlottesville, VA)
